credit_line: Museum purchase from Walter R. Scholz Memorial Fund
title: Brush
provenance: Sylvia Hoffman, New York, NY (Secretary to Tommi Partzinger; part of set given by Parzinger to Hoffman as a gift); Palumbo Gallery, New York, NY
description: Circular, with tapering handle.  Back engraved with stylized, reclining ancient Greek female figure holding bowl and jar.  Handle engraved with cross-hatched  decoration. (Set with 1998-21-1,3a,b)
name: Brush
